title: What Can a $60,000 Media Server Do?
description:
Our insane new TrueNAS M40 server allows us to edit videos over the 10gig network and store years worth of content accessible in milliseconds.

Download TrueNAS Core (free and open-source!) - https://www.truenas.com/truenas-core/
Check out iXsystems - https://www.ixsystems.com/

Follow Snazzy Labs on Twitter - http://twitter.com/snazzyq
Follow me on Instagram - http://instagram.com/snazzyq

00:00 We ditched our 336TB server
01:30 iXsystems sent us a server
02:29 Unboxing and Hardware Overview
12:26 Installation? Nah!
13:16 Admin Dashboard
21:01 ...just how fast is it?
